docs.snippet: GENEVA, March 13. -- Uruguay astonished the Chaco advisory committee of the League of Nations today when her delegate, Alberto N. Guani, flatly said that she would not place an arms embargo upon Paraguay unless all the neighboring nations placed an...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, March 13. -- Uruguay astonished the Chaco advisory committee of the League of Nations today when her delegate, Alberto N. Guani, flatly said that she would not place an arms embargo upon Paraguay unless all the neighboring nations placed an embargo upon Bolivia too.
docs.abstract: Uruguay's delegate to League bars arms embargo upon Paraguay unless it is also imposed upon Bolivia

headline.main: URUGUAY REFUSES BAN ON PARAGUAY; Astonishes League by Barring Arms Embargo Unless It Is Imposed on Bolivia, Too.

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: GENEVA, March 14. -- In a speech characterized as "the sharpest attack ever heard in Geneva," Bolivia's delegate to the League of Nations demanded an end of "the preaching of patience and the practice of intrigue" in dealing with the Chaco war.
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, March 14. -- In a speech characterized as "the sharpest attack ever heard in Geneva," Bolivia's delegate to the League of Nations demanded an end of "the preaching of patience and the practice of intrigue" in dealing with the Chaco war.
docs.abstract: Accuses Argentina and Uruguay of aiding Paraguay in Chaco dispute

headline.main: BOLIVIAN ASSAILS GENEVA 'INTRIGUE'; Demands League Find 'Something More Than Wooden Swords' to End Chaco War.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, March 15. -- The League of Nations' Chaco committee, in a night public meeting, unanimously adopted a resolution convoking a special Assembly May 20 "to consider the question of further application of the covenant."
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, March 15. -- The League of Nations' Chaco committee, in a night public meeting, unanimously adopted a resolution convoking a special Assembly May 20 "to consider the question of further application of the covenant."
docs.abstract: League com calls special Assembly May 20th

docs.snippet: GENEVA, March 16. -- Whatever may be the other results of the meetings of the League of Nations Chaco committee this week, they have served to throw light on the responsibility for the continuance of the war.
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, March 16. -- Whatever may be the other results of the meetings of the League of Nations Chaco committee this week, they have served to throw light on the responsibility for the continuance of the war.
